00081 
00088 inline stlsoft::basic_shim_string<ff_char_t, 64> to_f(
00089     double const&   value
00090 )
00091 {
00092     return 
00093 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00094       ::fastformat::inserters::
00095 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00096         real(value, ximpl_real::default_width_sentinel_(), ximpl_real::default_precision_sentinel_(), 'f');
00097 }
00098 
00111 inline stlsoft::basic_shim_string<ff_char_t, 64> to_f(
00112     double const&   value
00113 ,   int             minimumWidth
00114 ,   int             decimalPlaces
00115 )
00116 {
00117     return 
00118 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00119       ::fastformat::inserters::
00120 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00121         real(value, minimumWidth, decimalPlaces, 'f');
00122 }
